ECEntityClass.description: A resource defining one or more 2D areas that may have voids.
A T-shaped Profile similar to rolled steel T-shapes.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the width (top flange), defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Extent of the depth (web length), defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Constant wall thickness of the flange.
Constant wall thickness of the web.
The fillet radius between the web and the flange. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of flange edges. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the lower face of the flange. Non-zero in case of tapered flange, 0 in case of non-tapered flange, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of web edges. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the web. Non-zero in case of tapered web, 0 in case of non-tapered web, default 0 if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: Profile of a plate that has been bent at a given point with a given angle.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the plate length, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Inner angle of the bend point. Value is valid in range (0..180) degrees. Values near 180 degrees meaning an almost unbent plate and values near 0 are almost fully bent in half plate.
Offset from the left edge of the plate defining at what point the plate is bent.
Inner fillet radius of the bend point.

ECEntityClass.description: A C shaped Profile similar to rolled steel C-shapes.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the flange, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Extent of the web, defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Constant wall thickness of the web.
The fillet radius between the web and the flange. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of the lower edges of the top flange and the upper edges of the bottom flange. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the lower face of the top flange and of the upper face of the bottom flange. Non-zero in case of tapered flanges, 0 in case of parallel flanges, default 0 if not specified.
Extent of the rectangle in the direction of the x-axis.
Extent of the rectangle in the direction of the y-axis.
Radius of the circular arcs, by which all four corners of the inner contour of rectangle are equally rounded. Default 0 (= no rounding arcs) if not specified.
Radius of the circular arcs, by which all four corners of the outer contour of rectangle are equally rounded. Default 0 (= no rounding arcs) if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: An I shaped Profile similar to rolled steel I-shapes.

ECProperty.description: Extent of the width (flange length), defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Extent of the depth (web length), defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Flange thickness of the I-shape. Both, the upper and the lower flanges have the same thickness and they are centred on the y-axis of the position coordinate system.
Web thickness of the I-shape. The web is centred on the x-axis and the y-axis of the position coordinate system.
The fillet radius between the web and the flange. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of the lower edges of the top flange and the upper edges of the bottom flange. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the lower faces of the top flange and of the upper faces of the bottom flange. Non-zero in case of tapered flanges, 0 in case of parallel flanges, default 0 if not specified.

ECEntityClass.description: An L-shaped Profile (also refered as Angle) similar to rolled steel L-shapes.

ECProperty.description: Horizontal leg length, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Vertical leg length, defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.
Fillet radius between legs. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Radius of flange edges. 0 if sharp-edged, default 0 if not specified.
Slope of the inner faces of the legs. Non-zero in case of tapered legs, 0 in case of perpendicular legs, default 0 if not specified.
Count of sides (edges) the polygon is made of. Value cannot be less than 3 (triangle).
Constant length of each polygon side (edge).

ECEntityClass.description: A ParametricProfile comprised of one HollowCircle and a new shape.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Bent Plate With SR Inside Legs
ECEntityClass.description: Profile of a plate that has been bent at a given point with a given angle with a Circle at centre.

ECProperty.description: Inner fillet radius of the bend point.
The radius of the first SolidRound.
The radius of the second SolidRound.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Bent Plate With SR on Heel
ECEntityClass.description: Profile of a plate that has been bent at a given point with a given angle and attached with solid round on heel

ECProperty.description: Extent of the plate length, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.
Inner angle of the bend point. Value is valid in range (0..180) degrees. Values near 180 degrees meaning an almost unbent plate and values near 0 are almost fully bent in half plate.
Offset from the left edge of the plate defining at what point the plate is bent.
Inner fillet radius of the bend point.
The radius of the first SolidRound.
The radius of the split pipe.

ECEntityClass.description: Profile of a plate that has been bent at a given point with a given angle with another bentplate.
Profile of a plate that has been bent at a given point with a given angle.
